meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s1
section.heading: Exclusion
section.content: The premises specified in the Schedule are excluded from the application of the Ordinance.

section.name: s1
section.content: Premises of any corporation which is registered under the Building Management Ordinance (Cap. 344). (27 of 1993 s. 55)

section.name: s2
section.content: Premises of any mutual aid committee approved for the purposes of the Societies Ordinance (Cap. 151) by the Secretary for Home and Youth Affairs by notice in writing. (L.N. 144 of 2022)

section.name: s5
section.leadIn: The following club-houses situated in Government premises—
